module_summary: Interphase manages phase tracking, gate enforcement, and work discovery within Clavain and bead-based workflows.

now.title: Increase phase transition determinism and resilience across long sessions.

next.title: Improve gate diagnostics for partial artifacts and stale state recovery.
Add deeper inter-module phase telemetry to Clavain sprint orchestration.
Prototype adaptive phase sequencing for non-linear execution paths.
